mapper.update: update app_appointment_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_time = #{optTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appoint_time = #{appointTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disease = #{disease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error = #{error,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, opt_time, appoint_time, doctor_id, doctor_name, hospital, department, disease, finish_time, error from app_appointment_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
